name: DieFly
description:
Survive in an arena with infinite Sawblades. Choose between different blades and evade them.

Try to pick up your hearts and restore your health after hitting sawblades.

CONTROLS:

LMB - Fly

RMB - Slow Motion

Mouse - Change Direction

Fonts: https://somepx.itch.io/humble-fonts-free

Tileset: https://vectorpixelstar.itch.io/1-bit-patterns-and-tiles

Sounds: https://sfbgames.itch.io/chiptone
